text: I'm here to tell you there's no wrong
way to grill corn ever since corn was
first grilled probably 5000 years ago in
Mexico or South America people have been
grilling it and they've been grilling
with different methods some people threw
it in the ashes in the husk some people
took the little silk cloth some people
soaked it in water
some people stripped it entirely
everybody's got their own thing whatever
I'm going to show you a way I like to do
it and if you think I'm wrong I don't
really want to hear about it this is it
I take an ear of corn I shock it and I'm
actually I don't want criticism of my
shucking technique either I did not grow
up in Iowa now having said there's more
than one way to do this this is the part
of the recipe you have to stick to if
you begin with the potato it will not
work put the corn on the grill the grill
should be hot walk away only you can say
how long you're going to walk away for
it because if your grill is roaring hot
it'll be 30 seconds or a minute if your
grill is a typical gas grill it's going
to be 2 or 3 minutes I like a kind of
random pattern here I like some kernels
really blackened some not so let this go
for another minute or so and show you
one of many sauces you can use on corn
of course we all know melted butter
plain salt if the corn is really good
this is a little thing I picked up that
in Mexico sort of classic Mexican Street
food mayonnaise lime juice
you will remember that we did an entire
video on all the different things you
can do with mayonnaise
here's another so you want to kind of
thin almost yogurty milky texture here
and then some chili powder a nice
topping for corn and yet another thing
you can do with Mayo I like this one I'm
going to let the rest of these go for a
bit well this one's good what I'm
looking for and what you are looking for
may be different things but I like some
kernels that are really charred get that
great kind of charred sweetness it's
almost like roasted marshmallows this
corn of course should be sweet nice
the second that chili powder hits the
corn the aroma is explosive voila
as you can see a very flexible recipe
how long you cook the corn how you cook
the corn what you put on it but for it
to work you must start with corn
